articles.author: Jamie Spencer
articles.title: Man Utd 'monitoring' impressive Bournemouth left-back - 90min UK
articles.description: Manchester United could recruit a new left-back this summer after it became a problem position in 2023/24 due to injuries to both Luke Shaw and Tyrell Malacia.
articles.content:
Manchester United could recruit a new left-back this summer after it became a problem position in 2023/24 due to injuries to both Luke Shaw and Tyrell Malacia.
